documentId: Understanding Arguments_ An Introduction to Informal Logic (1)
content:
not?
3.  Some of Curley’s arguments depend on specific doctrines of traditional
Christianity. Does this make his arguments weaker? Why or why not?
4.  Is there any better reason to deny the existence of God that Curley
overlooked? If so, present it as forcefully as you can.
DISCUSSIONQUESTIONS
